entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or wet flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers with wet snow early this morning and with wet flurries early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
